content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: UnMonitorSite path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/waf/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/monitoring content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum disable monitoring mode
desc restore the waf features original enabled or disabled state
responses
title: 35_WAF Features_UnMonitorSite_201.json
